text:
The critical issues that led us to adopt
the AWS storage service, object storage,
were related to a need to evolve

and therefore the need
to ensure scalability,

and security in the management
of the entire infrastructure.

in addition to those
at an infrastructural level
function and efficiency in the offices,

therefore improving how quickly
tasks are carried out in the offices,

which is obviously reflected
in a better service for the citizen,

that get served faster in their
interactions with the public entity.
